description: Always wondered how to make bread? Agnes from VIC shares her secrets to making the best light, crusty Italian bread with this easy bread recipe.
name: Crusty Italian Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lid, spray with oil, then bake for a further 20 minutes or until golden and hollow sounding when tapped. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
